snippet.title: Solitaire TriPeaks Flowers - Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Solitaire TriPeaks Flowers is a classic card game offering relaxing gameplay, soothing soundtrack, beautiful graphics and a high re-play value. Oh and there are cats in it too! 
Game available now! on Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/solitaire-tripeaks-flowers-switch/

The goal of the game is to tap on any card that is one higher or one lower than the card on the pile. When there are no moves left, the player should tap the talon. He can also buy 5 more cards if there are no more cards available in the talon. And of course whenever a make is being made, the gamer can reverse his previous move.

MAIN FEATURES
• Enjoy the stress-free experience that will provide you with countless hours of fun and harmony.
• Play hundreds of levels filled with the most addictive version of solitaire there is.
• Fill your greenhouses with the most beautiful flowers of all colors.
• Do all that along with your trusty cat companion that shall help you along the journey.

===================================
Official website:http://www.7lvls.com/solitairetripeaksflowers/
Facebook: http://www.fb.com/7lvls/
